mapper.sql: employment_id, employment_studentId, employment_time, employment_city, employment_unit, employment_Salary_probation, employment_Salary_worker, employment_engaged_type, employment_welfare, employment_remarks,employment_engaged,employment_status
mapper.select: select stu_Id,stu_number from oa_jzb_student GROUP BY stu_number

SELECT intentional_City,oa_scb_education.education as xueli, oa_jwb_grade.name as banji FROM oa_jzb_student INNER JOIN oa_scb_education ON oa_scb_education.id = oa_jzb_student.education_id INNER JOIN oa_jwb_grade ON oa_jwb_grade.id= oa_jzb_student.grade_id GROUP BY intentional_City

SELECT intentional_City,oa_scb_education.education as xueli, oa_jwb_grade.name as banji FROM oa_jzb_student INNER JOIN oa_scb_education ON oa_scb_education.id = oa_jzb_student.education_id INNER JOIN oa_jwb_grade ON oa_jwb_grade.id= oa_jzb_student.grade_id WHERE oa_jwb_grade.struts = 3 GROUP BY banji

SELECT intentional_City,oa_scb_education.education as xueli, oa_jwb_grade.name as banji FROM oa_jzb_student INNER JOIN oa_scb_education ON oa_scb_education.id = oa_jzb_student.education_id INNER JOIN oa_jwb_grade ON oa_jwb_grade.id= oa_jzb_student.grade_id GROUP BY xueli

SELECT COUNT(counts) FROM (SELECT oa_jzb_student.stu_Id ,COUNT(*) counts FROM oa_jyb_employment INNER JOIN oa_jzb_student ON oa_jzb_student.stu_Id=oa_jyb_employment.employment_studentId INNER JOIN oa_jwb_grade ON oa_jwb_grade.id= oa_jzb_student.grade_id left JOIN oa_scb_education ON oa_scb_education.id = oa_jzb_student.education_id INNER JOIN oa_rlzyb_user ON oa_rlzyb_user.emp_id = oa_jwb_grade.obtainID where oa_jwb_grade.struts > 2 and employment_status ='待业'
and oa_jwb_grade.name = #{employments.className}
and oa_jzb_student.stu_age < 18
and oa_jzb_student.stu_age >= 18 and oa_jzb_student.stu_age <= 20
and oa_jzb_student.stu_age > 20 and oa_jzb_student.stu_age <= 24
and oa_jzb_student.stu_age > 24
AND oa_rlzyb_user.emp_id =#{empTecid}
GROUP BY oa_jzb_student.stu_number ) t

SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM ( SELECT employment_city,employment_status, oa_jwb_grade.name AS className, oa_scb_education.education AS record ,oa_jzb_student.stu_number FROM oa_jyb_employment INNER JOIN oa_jzb_student ON oa_jzb_student.stu_Id=oa_jyb_employment.employment_studentId INNER JOIN oa_jwb_grade ON oa_jwb_grade.id= oa_jzb_student.grade_id INNER JOIN oa_scb_education ON oa_scb_education.id = oa_jzb_student.education_id ORDER BY employment_time DESC)c GROUP BY stu_number)d where employment_status= '已就业' OR employment_status='自主' OR employment_status='未就业' GROUP BY employment_city

SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM ( SELECT employment_city,employment_status, oa_jwb_grade.name AS className, oa_scb_education.education AS record ,oa_jzb_student.stu_number FROM oa_jyb_employment INNER JOIN oa_jzb_student ON oa_jzb_student.stu_Id=oa_jyb_employment.employment_studentId INNER JOIN oa_jwb_grade ON oa_jwb_grade.id= oa_jzb_student.grade_id INNER JOIN oa_scb_education ON oa_scb_education.id = oa_jzb_student.education_id ORDER BY employment_time DESC)c GROUP BY stu_number)d WHERE className=#{className} and employment_status = '已就业' OR employment_status='自主' GROUP BY employment_city

SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM ( SELECT employment_city,employment_status, oa_jwb_grade.name AS className, oa_scb_education.education AS record ,oa_jzb_student.stu_number FROM oa_jyb_employment INNER JOIN oa_jzb_student ON oa_jzb_student.stu_Id=oa_jyb_employment.employment_studentId INNER JOIN oa_jwb_grade ON oa_jwb_grade.id= oa_jzb_student.grade_id INNER JOIN oa_scb_education ON oa_scb_education.id = oa_jzb_student.education_id ORDER BY employment_time DESC)c GROUP BY stu_number)d
GROUP BY record

SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM ( SELECT employment_city,employment_status, oa_jwb_grade.name AS className, oa_scb_education.education AS record ,oa_jzb_student.stu_number FROM oa_jyb_employment INNER JOIN oa_jzb_student ON oa_jzb_student.stu_Id=oa_jyb_employment.employment_studentId INNER JOIN oa_jwb_grade ON oa_jwb_grade.id= oa_jzb_student.grade_id INNER JOIN oa_scb_education ON oa_scb_education.id = oa_jzb_student.education_id ORDER BY employment_time DESC)c GROUP BY stu_number)d WHERE className=#{className} and employment_status = '已就业' OR employment_status='自主' GROUP BY record

SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM ( SELECT employment_city, oa_jwb_grade.name AS className, oa_scb_education.education AS record ,oa_jzb_student.stu_number FROM oa_jyb_employment INNER JOIN oa_jzb_student ON oa_jzb_student.stu_Id=oa_jyb_employment.employment_studentId INNER JOIN oa_jwb_grade ON oa_jwb_grade.id= oa_jzb_student.grade_id INNER JOIN oa_scb_education ON oa_scb_education.id = oa_jzb_student.education_id ORDER BY employment_time DESC)c GROUP BY stu_number)d GROUP BY className

select oa_jzb_student.stu_Id, oa_jzb_student.stu_number, oa_jzb_student.stu_name,oa_jzb_student.spellName, oa_jzb_student.contact_way , oa_jzb_student.education_id,oa_jzb_student.grade_id,oa_jzb_student.stu_sex, oa_jzb_student.intentional_City,oa_jzb_student.address,oa_jzb_student.ID_number,oa_jzb_student.stu_age,
from oa_jyb_employment INNER JOIN oa_jzb_student ON oa_jzb_student.stu_Id=oa_jyb_employment.employment_studentId INNER JOIN oa_jwb_grade ON oa_jwb_grade.id= oa_jzb_student.grade_id
and employment_id= #{employment_id}
group by oa_jzb_student.stu_number

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( select oa_jwb_grade.name as className , oa_jzb_student.stu_Id, oa_jzb_student.stu_number, oa_jzb_student.stu_name,oa_jzb_student.spellName, oa_jzb_student.stu_age,oa_jzb_student.contact_way , oa_scb_education.education as record , employment_id, employment_studentId, employment_time, employment_city, employment_unit, employment_Salary_probation, employment_Salary_worker, employment_engaged_type, employment_welfare, employment_remarks,employment_engaged ,employment_status from oa_jyb_employment INNER JOIN oa_jzb_student ON oa_jzb_student.stu_Id=oa_jyb_employment.employment_studentId INNER JOIN oa_jwb_grade ON oa_jwb_grade.id= oa_jzb_student.grade_id INNER JOIN oa_scb_education ON oa_scb_education.id = oa_jzb_student.education_id
ORDER BY oa_jyb_employment.employment_time DESC ) emp GROUP BY stu_number ) empstat
and className = #{className}
and employment_status= #{employment_status}
and employment_city = #{employment_city}
and record=#{record}
and employment_Salary_worker >= 2000 and employment_Salary_worker <= 4000
and employment_Salary_worker > 4000 and employment_Salary_worker <= 6000
and employment_Salary_worker > 6000 and employment_Salary_worker <= 8000
and employment_Salary_worker > 8000
and stu_age < 18
and stu_age >= 18 and stu_age <= 20
and stu_age > 20 and stu_age <= 24
and stu_age > 24
mapper.insert:
insert into oa_jyb_employment
employment_engaged,
employment_studentId,
employment_time,
employment_city,
employment_unit,
employment_Salary_probation,
employment_Salary_worker,
employment_engaged_type,
employment_welfare,
employment_remarks,
employment_status,
#{employment_engaged,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{employment_studentId.stu_Id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{employment_time,jdbcType=DATE},
#{employment_city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{employment_unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{employment_Salary_probation,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{employment_Salary_worker,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{employment_engaged_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{employment_welfare,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{employment_remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{employment_status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update oa_jyb_employment
employment_studentId = #{employment_studentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
employment_time = #{employment_time,jdbcType=DATE},
employment_city = #{employment_city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
employment_unit = #{employment_unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
employment_engaged = #{employment_engaged,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
employment_Salary_probation = #{employment_Salary_probation,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
employment_Salary_worker = #{employment_Salary_worker,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
employment_engaged_type = #{employment_engaged_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
employment_status = #{employment_status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
employment_welfare = #{employment_welfare,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
employment_remarks = #{employment_remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where employment_id = #{employment_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT oa_jyb_employment.* FROM oa_jyb_employment INNER JOIN oa_jzb_student ON oa_jzb_student.stu_Id=oa_jyb_employment.employment_studentId INNER JOIN oa_jwb_grade ON oa_jwb_grade.id= oa_jzb_student.grade_id where oa_jyb_employment.employment_studentId = #{stuid}
